data.title: Generated by Personal Ancestral File
data.text:
Descendants of Count of Prigord Wulgrin D'ANJOU

Fifteenth Generation

(Continued)

1931. Valdemar IV DE DANEMARK roi, de Danemark "Atterdag" (Christoffer II DE DANEMARK , Erik V DE DANEMARK , Christoffer I DE DANEMARK , Brenge DE BOURGOGNE , Douce DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger IV DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) was born about 1320. He died on 24 Oct 1375 in Gurre. He was buried in Sor.

Valdemar married Hedwige DE DANEMARK daughter of ric II DE DANEMARK Duke of Schleswig and Adlade VON HOLSTEIN comtesse, von Holstein in 1340. Hedwige died in 1374.

They had the following children:

2950 M i Christophe DE DANEMARK Duke of Laaland was born in 1344. He died in 1363. 2951 F ii Ingeburge DE DANEMARK was born in 1347. She died in 1370. Ingeburge married Heinrich I (III) VON MECKLENBURG-SCHWERIN duc, von Mecklenburg son of Albrecht I (II) VON MECKLENBURG-SCHWERIN duc, von Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Eufemia FOLKUNGA Princess of Sue in 1361. Heinrich was born before 1350. He died in 1383. 2952 F iii Margrethe I DE DANEMARK Queen of Sue was born in Mar 1353 in Sborghus, Danemark. She died on 28 Oct 1412 in pr de Flensborg, Slesvig. She was buried in Roskilde, Danemark. Margrethe married Haakon VI FOLKUNGA roi, de Sue son of Magnus II FOLKUNGA roi, de Norve and Blanche DE DAMPIERRE Countess of Namur on 9 Apr 1363. Haakon was born in Aug 1340. He died on 10 Sep 1380.

1933. Mathilde VON MECKLENBURG (Beatrix VON BRANDENBURG-STARGARD , Mechtild DE DANEMARK , Christoffer I DE DANEMARK , Brenge DE BOURGOGNE , Douce DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger IV DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) was born estimated 1293. She died on 3 Jun 1350/1359.

Mathilde married Otto III WELF duc, von Braunschweig-Lneburg son of Otto II WELF and Mathilde VON WITTELSBACH. Otto was born in 1296. He died on 19 Aug 1352/1353.

They had the following children:

2953 F i Mathilde VON BRAUNSCHWEIG-LNEBURG died on 7 Sep 1357. Mathilde married Otto II VON WALDECK comte, von Waldeck son of Heinrich IV VON WALDECK comte, von Waldeck and Adelheid DE CLES. Otto was born estimated 1344. He died about 1369.

1935. tienne V Dragoutin NEMANYA Duke of Bosnie (Hle DE COURTENAY , Marie DE BRIENNE , Brenge DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) died in 1316.

tienne married Catherine RP daughter of Istv V RP roi, de Hongrie and Elisabeth DES COUMANS estimated 1269. Catherine was born estimated 1256.

They had the following children:

2954 M i Vladislav NEMANYA died in 1324.

1936. tienne-Ouroch II NEMANYA roi, de Serbie (Hle DE COURTENAY , Marie DE BRIENNE , Brenge DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) died in 1321.

tienne-Ouroch married Simonida PALAIOLOGINA daughter of Emperor of Constantinople Andronikos PALAIOLOGOS II and Violante DI MONFERRATO in 1299. Simonida was born about 1293. She died after 1336.

They had the following children:

2955 M i tienne-Ouroch III NEMANYA roi, de Serbie died in 1334 in Zvecan. tienne-Ouroch married Unknown. 2956 M ii Constantin NEMANYA died in 1321.

1937. Henri IV D'AVAUGOUR Count of Goello (Marie DE BEAUMONT , Louis DE BRIENNE , Brenge DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) died in 1334.

Henri married Jeanne D'HARCOURT Dame of l'Aigle daughter of Jean II D'HARCOURT marchal, de France and Jeanne DE CHELLERAULT Viscountess of Chellerault in 1306.

They had the following children:

2957 F i Jeanne D'AVAUGOUR comtesse, d'Avaugour died in 1327. Jeanne married Guy VII DE DREUX Count of Gollo son of Arthur II DE DREUX Count of Richmond and Marie DE LIMOGES Viscountess of Limoges in 1318. Guy was born in 1287. He died on 26 Mar 1331 in Nijon. He was buried in Guingamp. 2958 F ii Marguerite D'AVAUGOUR. Marguerite married Herv VII DE LON Lord of Noyon-sur-Andele son of Herv VI DE LON chevalier Lord of Noyon-sur-Andelle and Jeanne DE MONTMORENCY in 1334. Herv died in 1343. 2959 F iii Isabeau D'AVAUGOUR. Isabeau married (1) Geoffroi DE CHEAUBRIANT. Isabeau married (2) Louis DE THOUARS Viscount of Thouars.

1945. Isabelle DE BEAUMONT (Henri DE BEAUMONT , Louis DE BRIENNE , Brenge DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) died after 1356.

Isabelle married Duke of Lancaster Henri PLANTAGENET II "de Grosmont" son of Count of Leicester Henri PLANTAGENET and Maud CHAWORTH in 1334. Henri was born about 1301. He died in 1361.

They had the following children:

2960 F i Mathilde PLANTAGENET is printed as #2426. 2961 F ii Blanche PLANTAGENET is printed as #2427.

1946. Robert DE BRIENNE Viscount of Beaumont (Jean DE BRIENNE , Louis DE BRIENNE , Brenge DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) died on 28 Sep 1327.

Robert married Marie DE CRAON daughter of Maurice VI DE CRAON and Mahaud BERTHOUT on 24 Aug 1299 in Paris, 75. Marie died on 21 Aug 1322. She was buried in Couvent des Cordeliers d'Angers.

They had the following children:

2962 M i Jean DE BRIENNE Viscount of Beaumont, 10 is printed as #1633. 2963 F ii Marguerite DE BRIENNE is printed as #1634.

1948. Jean I DE FIENNES Baron of Tingry (Blanche DE BRIENNE , Jean DE BRIENNE , Brenge DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) was born about 1270. He died after 1333.

Jean married Isabeau DE DAMPIERRE daughter of Guy DE DAMPIERRE Count of Namur and Isabelle DE LUXEMBOURG in 1307. Isabeau was born about 1275. She died in 1323.

They had the following children:

2964 F i Jeanne DE FIENNES is printed as #2503.

1954. Pedro Nez DE GUZM Lord of Manzanedo (Urraca Alonso DE CASTILLE , Alphonse X DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand III DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin )

Pedro married Mara DE LA CERDA daughter of Juan Alonso DE LA CERDA Lord of Gibralen and Maria DE BOURGOGNE.

They had the following children:

2965 M i Alvar Prez DE GUZM Lord of Manzanedo is printed as #2918.

1955. Enrique ENRQUEZ Lord of Villalba, 2 (Enrique ENRQUEZ , Henri DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand III DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ).

Enrique married Teresa DE HARO.

They had the following children:

2966 F i Isabel ENRQUEZ Isabel married Garci Ferndez MANRIQUE DE LARA seigneur, d'Estar son of Garci Ferndez MANRIQUE DE LARA seigneur, d'Amusco, 6 and Teresa Vquez DE TOLEDO.

1956. Constance DE CASTILLE (Jean-Emmanuel DE CASTILLE , Emmanuel DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand III DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) was born in 1323. She died on 13 Nov 1345.

Constance married Pedro I DE BOURGOGNE Queen of Portugal, 8 "o Justiceiro" son of Afonso IV DE BOURGOGNE Queen of Portugal, 7 and Batrice DE CASTILLE ranha, de Portugal in 1340 in Lisboa. Pedro was born on 8 Apr 1320 in Coimbra. He died on 18 Jan 1367 in Estremoz. He was buried in Mosteiro de Alcobaa.

They had the following children:

2967 F i Marie DE BOURGOGNE is printed as #2911. 2968 M ii Fernando I DE BOURGOGNE Queen of Portugal is printed as #2912.

1957. Jeanne DE CASTILLE (Jean-Emmanuel DE CASTILLE , Emmanuel DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand III DE CASTILLE , Alphonse IX DE CASTILLE , Ferdinand II DE CASTILLE , Brenge DE BARCELONE , Raimond-Brenger III DE BARCELONE , Raymond-Brenger II DE BARCELONE , Almodis DE LA MARCHE , Bernard I DE LA MARCHE , Aldebert I DE LA MARCHE , Emma DE PRIGORD , Guillaume PRIGORD , Wulgrin ) was born in 1339. She died in 1381.

Jeanne married Henri II DE CASTILLE King of Len "le Magnifique" son of Alphonse Xi DE CASTILLE King of Len and lonore DE GUZM in 1350. Henri was born about 1334. He died in 1379.

They had the following children:

2969 F i lonore DE CASTILLE infante, de Castille was born in 1352. She died in 1416. lonore married Charles III D'VREUX Duke of Nemours "le Noble" son of Charles II D'VREUX roi, de Navarre and Jeanne DE VALOIS in 1375. Charles was born in 1361. He died in 1425. 2970 M ii Jean I DE CASTILLE prtendant au trne, de Portugal was born in 1358. He died in 1390. Jean married (1) lonore D'ARAGON daughter of Pierre IV D'ARAGON King of Aragon and lonore D'ARAGON in 1375. lonore was born in 1358. She died in 1382. Jean married (2) Batrice DE BOURGOGNE daughter of Fernando I DE BOURGOGNE Queen of Portugal and Leonor TELLES DE MENEZES ranha, de Portugal in 1383. Batrice was born in 1372.
